alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 9:01AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...Water level rises expected from the release of the Valdez Glacier Dam Lake... Valdez Glacier Dam Lake appears to be releasing as the Valdez Glacier River is beginning to rise rapidly. Water levels on the Valdez Glacier River can be expected to rise approximately 3 feet over the next 24-36 hours as the glacier dam releases. Additional rises are expected through this afternoon (Monday) cresting early to mid day tomorrow (Tuesday). EXPECTED IMPACTS: No significant impacts to any area roads or campgrounds are expected. Some bank erosion may be possible due to rapidly changing river levels. Recreators in the vicinity of the Valdez Glacier River should be prepared for rapidly rising river level over the next 24 hours. Please visit weather.gov/anchorage for the latest updates.
